comments:
Cannot save Japanese (or German) characters in the execution history - it 
throws an exception:

!MESSAGE org.eclipse.hyades.loaders.util.InvalidXMLException
!STACK 0
org.eclipse.hyades.loaders.util.InvalidXMLException
	at org.eclipse.hyades.loaders.util.XMLLoader.error(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.loaders.util.SAXFragmentHandler.parse(Unknown 
Source)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.loaders.util.SAXFragmentHandler$1.run(Unknown 
Source)

This looks similar with https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=75898.

Check if the fragments that you are passing to the loader are XML valid and
UTF-8 encoded.

This can be fixed at the consuming product end by passing the XML fragment 
with explicit UTF-8 encoding.  They have verified this fix.  Closing the 
defect.
